description: This Panasonic DMW-BCG10 Replacement Lithium-Ion Battery (1000 mAh) for you to keep as an extra power source for your digital device.Keep the extra battery handy for use and never miss a photo opportunity or any moment you want to take picture FEATURES:High Capacity replacement Lithium-Ion Battery Rated at 1000mAh To meet or exceed the original equipment manufacturers specifications at a reduced price Standard replacement rechargeable battery for you to keep as an extra power source handy This Replacement Battery is 100% compatible with the Panasonic DMW-BCG10 1000mAh. SPECIFICATIONS: Output Voltage: 3.7VBattery Type: Replacement Battery Replacement part#: Panasonic DMW-BCG10Battery Capacity: 1000 mAhIMPORTANT NOTE: Photo-shooting and picture playback times with this battery may vary depending on user habits, camera settings, LCD monitor on/off, features activated, shooting environment, ambient temperature and other factors.
title: Panasonic DMW-BCG10 ID Secured Battery for Select Panasonic Cameras - Retail Packaging
